q: "By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead." Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. The news surprised and worried Google observers. "The executive change is very much unexpected, and somewhat of a concern to investors," said Clayton Moran, an analyst at Benchmark Co..
